languages.text: "Биология ксеносов отлична от человеческой. Хотел бы я иметь возможность на практике изучить, что доставляет наивысшую боль врагам Человечества..."
"Xenos biology is different from human biology. I wish I had the opportunity to study first-hand what causes the greatest pain to enemies of Humanity..."
languages.original_text: "Биология ксеносов отлична от человеческой. Хотел бы я иметь возможность на практике изучить, что доставляет наивысшую боль врагам Человечества..."

"Xenos biology is different from human biology. I wish I had the opportunity to study first-hand what causes the greatest pain to enemies of Humanity..."
"Xenos biology is different from human biology. I wish I had the opportunity to study first-hand what causes the greatest pain to enemies of Humanity..."

languages.text: “异形的生物结构不同于人类。我真希望有机会能亲自研究要如何给人类之敌带来最大的痛苦……”
languages.original_text: "Xenos biology is different from human biology. I wish I had the opportunity to study first-hand what causes the greatest pain to enemies of Humanity..."

traits.locale_text: “异形的生物结构不同于人类。我真希望有机会能亲自研究要如何给人类之敌带来最大的痛苦……”

languages.text: « La biologie xénos est bien différente de la biologie humaine. J'aimerais beaucoup avoir un jour l'occasion de faire des recherches sur ce qui cause la plus grande souffrance aux ennemis de l'humanité... »
languages.original_text: "Xenos biology is different from human biology. I wish I had the opportunity to study first-hand what causes the greatest pain to enemies of Humanity..."

traits.locale_text: « La biologie xénos est bien différente de la biologie humaine. J'aimerais beaucoup avoir un jour l'occasion de faire des recherches sur ce qui cause la plus grande souffrance aux ennemis de l'humanité... »

languages.text: "Xenos-Biologie unterscheidet sich von menschlicher Biologie. Ich wünschte, ich hätte die Gelegenheit, aus erster Hand zu studieren, was den Feinden der Menschheit die größten Schmerzen bereitet ..."
languages.original_text: "Xenos biology is different from human biology. I wish I had the opportunity to study first-hand what causes the greatest pain to enemies of Humanity..."

traits.locale_text: "Xenos-Biologie unterscheidet sich von menschlicher Biologie. Ich wünschte, ich hätte die Gelegenheit, aus erster Hand zu studieren, was den Feinden der Menschheit die größten Schmerzen bereitet ..."

languages.text: 「異種族の生物学は人間の生物学とは異なる。何が人類の敵に最大の苦痛を与えるのか、直接する機会があればいいのだが…」
languages.original_text: "Xenos biology is different from human biology. I wish I had the opportunity to study first-hand what causes the greatest pain to enemies of Humanity..."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の生物学は人間の生物学とは異なる。何が人類の敵に最大の苦痛を与えるのか、直接する機会があればいいのだが…」

languages.text: «La biología xenos es distinta de la humana. Ojalá tuviera ocasión de comprobar de primera mano qué métodos infligen el máximo dolor a los enemigos de la Humanidad...»
languages.original_text: "Xenos biology is different from human biology. I wish I had the opportunity to study first-hand what causes the greatest pain to enemies of Humanity..."

traits.locale_text: «La biología xenos es distinta de la humana. Ojalá tuviera ocasión de comprobar de primera mano qué métodos infligen el máximo dolor a los enemigos de la Humanidad...»

languages.text: "Zeno biyolojisi, insan biyolojisinden farklı. Keşke İnsanlığın düşmanlarına en büyük acılara neyin sebep olduğunu ilk elden öğrenme fırsatım olsa..."
